name: Yanma

evolution.description: Yanma can evolve into Yanmega at the time 'Ancient Power' is learned. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Clear Wing Pokémon. Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This Pokémon uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is increased by 10 feet while in an environment related to its type (DM Discretion).

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: This Pokémon gets an additional +1 to attack rolls.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: Upon entering a battle, a single opponent’s held item is revealed, if it has one.
